Author: Aida Enna
Name: Portrait Fixer
Punchline: Automatically update your portrait when your gearset gets updated
Description:
When you click "Update Gear Set", this plugin will automatically update and save your portrait to match your new glam.

This plugin is in testing and will have one more issues, laid out below:

- Rarely, a glitched desynth window will pop up when saving the gearset instead of it saving the portrait. This is being investigated, closing the window and swapping classes seems to fix it.

Please report issues/bugs on the Github website by clicking the globe icon.
